title: Tabbouleh with Coriander
ingredients: ['525ml water', '150g bulgur wheat', '2 tomatoes, seeded and finely chopped', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced', '35g fresh coriander, coarsely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped or to taste', '2 lemons, juiced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon freshly cracked pepper', 'salt to taste']
